attributes.action: Stop plans for Pay-As-You-Dump Tax on Rubbish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As plans emerge that the Prime Minister plans to introduce a Pay-As-You-Dump Tax on Rubbish, we ask the Prime Misister to scrap the plans, as the low income and poor families can not possibly afford another Tax for a service we already pay for though our local Council Tax. 
We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to scrap these plans and to look for alternative solutions to this countrys Rubbish problems.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
